data.current_summary: Retrieve Legal Agreements for provided agreements keys
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves one or more legal agreements based on the provided agreement keys. Accepts multiple keys as input parameters to fetch corresponding LegalAgreement objects. Returns a collection of matching legal agreements with their full details. No authentication required. Non-existent keys are handled gracefully without affecting retrieval of valid agreements.
